chapter.text: yoguhaneun jaga dagchyeool beol-eul yoguhayeossdoda
(geu beol-eun) bulsinjadeul-eul wihan geos-euloseo, geugeos(beol)eul jeojihal jonjaeneun eobsnola
(geu beol-eun) seungcheon-ui gil-eul soyuhasin hananim-eulobuteo (oneun geos-ila)
geunal cheonsadeulgwa yeonghon-i geubunkkelo ollagani geunal-ui gigan-eun omannyeon-ila
geuleoni geudaeneun aleumdabge innaehala
sillo geudeul-eun geugeos(beol)eul meolge bojiman
naneun geugeos(beol)eul gakkabge bonola
geunal haneul-eun eong-gin gileumcheoleom doel geos-ila
geuligo sandeul-eun yangteolcheoleom doel geos-ila
ttohan hyeol-yug-eun (daleun) hyeol-yug-e daehae mudji anh-eul geos-ila

geudeul(hyeol-yug)i geudeul(daleun hyeol-yug)eul boge doem-edo (seoloui anbuleul mudji anh-eul geos-ila). aghaeng-eul jeojileun janeun geunal-ui jingbeol-eul beos-eonagi wihae jasin-ui jason-eul momgabs-eulo bachil suman issdamyeon hago galmanghadeola
jasin-ui baeujawa jasin-ui hyeongjewa
jasin-eul gamssajudeon gakkaun chincheoggwa
jigusang-e issneun moduleul bachyeoseolado geugeos(geudeul-ui momgabs)i geuleul guhae jugil (galmanghadeola)
geuleohji anhnola. geugeos(jiog)eun jag-yeolhaneun bulgil-ila
(jiog-eun) meoli kkeobjil-eul beosgyeo naemyeo
kkongmunileul ppaemyeo dol-aseossdeon jaleul buleul geos-ila
(jaesan-eul) mo-eugo ssah-a dudeon ja(leul buleul geos-ila)
sillo ingan-eun bin-yaghage changjodoeeossnola
geuege nappeun geos-i seuchimyeon keuge geunsimhago
geuege joh-eun geos-i seuchimyeon insaeghadeola
geuleona yebae deulineun jadeul-eun ye-oela
geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui yebaee iss-eo bujileonhan jadeul-imyeo
geudeul-ui jaesan-e iljeonghan mogs-i issneun jadeul-ini
gugeolhaneun gananhan jawa gugeolhaji anhneun gananhan jaleul wiham-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun simpan-ui nal-eul mid-eumyeo
geudeul junim-ui beol-e daehayeo sillo geunsimhaneun jadeul-ila
sillo geudeul junim-ui beol-ilan anjeonhae hal su eobsneun geos-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo jasin-ui sungyeol-eul jikineun jadeul-ila
geuleona geudeul-ui baeujana geudeul-ui oleunson-i soyuhan ja(noye)e gwanhayeoneun geudeul-i chaegmangbadji anhnola
geuleondedo geu ioeui geos-eul domohaneun jadeul-i issdamyeon jeodeul-eun sillo gyeong-gyeleul neom-eun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui sutagmulgwa gyeyag-eul jung-yohasineun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo gudgeonhi geudeul-ui jeung-eon-eul seoneun jadeul-ila
geuligo geudeul-eun sillo geudeul-ui yebaeleul jikim-e kkujunhadeola
geudeul-eun cheongug-e iss-eul myeong-yeloun jadeul-ila
bulsinhan jadeul-i geudae geuncheoeseo seoduleuni i eojjidoen il-inga
oleunjjoggwa oenjjog-eseo (geudeul-eun) gunjibhayeo issdeola
geudeul jung-ui modeun iga gippeum-ui cheongug-eulo ibseongdoegil huimanghandan mal-inga
geuleohji anhnola. sillo naneun, geudeul-i algo issneun geos-eulobuteo geudeul-eul changjohayeossnola
geulihayeo naega dongjjogdeulgwa seojjogdeul-ui junim-eul geolgo maengsehani jinsillo naneun neunglyeog-eul gajin jala
naneun geudeulboda deo hullyunghan jonjaelo daechehal neunglyeog-eul jinyeoss-euni geu nugudo naleul apseogal su eobsnola
geuleoni geudaeneun geudeul-eul noh-adula ; geudeul-eun nodag-imyeo noldaga gyeolgug geudeul-ui yagsogbad-eun nal-eul majdagtteulige doel geos-ila
geunal geudeul-eun machi usang jedan-eulo bunjuhi idonghaneun geoscheoleom geuleohge myojieseo jaeppalli geol-eo naol geos-ila
geudeul-ui nun-eun tteolgueojil geos-imyeo gul-yog-i geudeul-eul deopchil geos-ini jeo nal-eun geudeul-i yagsogbaddeon geunal-ila
